summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alleys in Block One Hundred Twenty-four (124) and One Hundred Twenty-five (125), A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition to the City of Seattle, by grading and paving the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 183 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
